metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2826 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from10.0 before 12.9.8, all versions starting from 12.10 before 12.10.7, allversions starting from 13.0 before 13.0.1. TODO

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
